description: Arisaema is a unique and amazing species of plant. Its exotic spadix and hooded spathe make it an eye-catching beauty. The plant grows from a rhizome which sends up a leafy, fern-like stem topped with a large and colorful hooded spathe, resembling a cobraâ€™s head. This stunning and exotic species is an herbaceous perennial, making it great for beautifying any garden. This plant is easy to grow and requires minimal care. In addition, it does well in wet and shady areas and provides color and texture to its surroundings. With its bright and unique colors, Arisaema is truly amazing.
